hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“The martyr does not feel anything more when he is killed than one of you feels if he is pinched (by a bug).”

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الشَّهَادَةِ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of martyrdom in the cause of Allah
